Headline: #34 South Michigan Temporary Reroute near 130h/King Dr
ShortDescription: 34 S Michigan buses rrtd SB buses will operate via Michigan,115th, Bishop Ford Exp, 115th; NB buses will operate via 130th, Bishop Ford Exp, 115th and Michigan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near 130h/King Dr.

Southbound buses will operate via Michigan,115th, Bishop Ford Expressway, 115th and Michigan.
Northbound buses will operate via 130th, Bishop Ford Expressway, 115th and Michigan.
Allow extra travel time.
